news.title: 美防毒行动首现美军士兵死亡
news.title0: Troop who fell overboard becomes first American killed in drug boat targeting operation
news.content: 一名美国海军陆战队员在加勒比海执行打击毒品走私船任务时落水身亡，成为该行动中首位已知的美军伤亡人员。
news.content0: A US Marine who fell overboard from an attack ship in the Caribbean has become the first known American casualty in the Trump administration's operation targeting drug-trafficking boats.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 药物副作用致患者盗窃成瘾，家庭破碎
news.title0: 'My husband stole £600k for sex and antiques' - drug side effects tearing families apart
news.content: 多巴胺激动剂药物可能导致患者产生赌博、购物、色情成瘾等冲动控制障碍，有患者因此盗用客户60万英镑，导致家庭悲剧。
news.content0: Frances had only just arrived at work when she received a phone call that turned her life upside down.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 泰勒·斯威夫特起诉阻止“Swift Home”商标
news.title0: Taylor Swift asks US government to block 'Swift Home' trademark
news.content: 流行歌手泰勒·斯威夫特要求美国政府阻止一家床上用品公司注册“Swift Home”商标，称其可能误导消费者认为她已为该品牌背书。
news.content0: Pop star Taylor Swift has asked the US government to stop a bedding company's attempt to trademark the phrase "Swift Home", saying it could mislead consumers into believing she had endorsed their products.
news.author: BBC

news.title: FBI公布女主播母亲绑架案嫌犯新细节
news.title0: FBI releases description of suspect in Nancy Guthrie kidnapping
news.content: FBI公布了涉嫌绑架美国新闻主播萨凡纳·格思里母亲的男子体貌特征，并悬赏10万美元征集线索。
news.content0: The FBI has released the first physical description of the man believed to have kidnapped Nancy Guthrie, the mother of US news anchor Savannah Guthrie.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 美国夫妇斥资百万在意大利购置农庄
news.title0: This American man spent $1 million on a new home in Italy. Here’s what he got for his money
news.content: 一名美国律师花费超过100万美元在意大利托斯卡纳购置了一座贵族农庄，举家从丹佛迁回祖辈离开的故土。
news.content0: His ancestors migrated from Italy to the United States in the late 1800s, and more than two centuries later, Vito Andrea Racanelli decided to do it all in reverse — leaving his home in Denver to return to the country his family left behind.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 佛罗里达乡村俱乐部因匹克球规则纠纷引发斗殴
news.title0: Pickleball dispute sparks brawl at Florida country club
news.content: 美国佛罗里达州一乡村俱乐部内，匹克球运动员因规则纠纷爆发斗殴，一名男子用球拍击打对手面部，其妻也参与其中。
news.content0: A dispute over a rule led to abrawlduring apickleballgame at a central Florida country club, authorities said, with one player hitting his opponent in the face with a paddle and punching him on the ground before others got involved.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 英国高等法院裁定禁巴勒斯坦行动组织不合法
news.title0: U.K. Ban on Pro-Palestinian Group Is Unlawful, Court Finds
news.content: 英国高等法院裁定，政府将亲巴勒斯坦抗议组织“巴勒斯坦行动”列为恐怖组织的决定不合法，这对首相斯塔默政府构成打击。
news.content0: The British government’s decision to ban a pro-Palestinian protest group as a terrorist organization was ruled unlawful on Friday by senior judges.
news.author: NYTimes

news.title: 伊朗利用数字监控工具追踪抗议者
news.title0: Iran Turns to Digital Surveillance Tools to Track Down Protesters
news.content: 伊朗当局利用手机定位数据等数字监控基础设施，向参与近期反政府示威的民众发送警告短信，以追踪和压制异议人士。
news.content0: When Iranians began protesting their government in late December, an ominous text message landed in some of their phones.
news.author: NYTimes

news.title: 罗伯特·肯尼迪自曝曾用马桶座圈吸食可卡因
news.title0: Robert F Kennedy Jr admits he used to 'snort cocaine off toilet seats'
news.content: 美国卫生部长罗伯特·肯尼迪在播客中承认，自己过去曾“用马桶座圈吸食可卡因”，并称因此“不害怕细菌”。
news.content0: Robert F Kennedy Jr has said he is "not scared of a germ" because he "used to snort cocaine off of toilet seats".
news.author: Sky News
